sqlGroup.name: fenceRecord
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mci.car_no,mf.name,mfr.`in_time`,mfr.`leavel_time` -- @where FROM mo_fence_record mfr LEFT JOIN mo_device md ON md.id = mfr.`device_id` LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.`device_id` = md.id LEFT JOIN mo_fence mf ON mf.id = mfr.`fence_id` -- @condition WHERE 1 = 1 order by create_time desc
